text: Darius Buia (born 30 April 1994) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Liga II side Viitorul Târgu Jiu.Darius Buia, fosta mare speranță a lui Dinamo, a ajuns în Liga 3 » Fiul lui Romulus Buia a semnat cu CSM Târgu Mureș. gsp.ro ==Personal life== Darius Buia is the son of former Romanian international Romulus Buia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Antwerp Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:CS Sportul Snagov players Category:ACS Viitorul Târgu Jiu players
title: Darius Buia
